archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.3.4b: b) resource overload (e.g. excessive use of the CPU, memory, hard disk and network) by restricting the maximum number of virtual instances that can be created on each piece of physical hardware.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
